item.title: Failed plastics negotiations in Geneva leave world few options to confront growing pollution crisis
item.description: Talks on a treaty to address the global crisis of plastic pollution in Geneva ended without an agreement Friday

item.title: Solar panels that fit on your balcony or deck are gaining traction in the US

item.title: Retail sales rise a solid 0.5% in July from June helped by rebounding auto sales
item.description: Shoppers stepped up their spending in July, particularly at the nation’s auto dealerships

item.title: UnitedHealth Group shares climb as Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway discloses stake in the insurer

item.title: China's economy lags in July under pressure from tariffs and a weak property market
item.description: China has reported its economy showed signs of slowing in July as factory output and retail sales slowed while housing prices fell further
